languages.text: "Говорят, Каллигос Винтерскейл — отважный исследователь, охотник и торговец. А у него все виноваты — я, Инцендия, варп-шторм... Только не он!"

traits.locale_text: "Говорят, Калигос Винтердейл — отважный исследователь, охотник и торговец. А у него все виноваты — я, Инцендия, варп-шторм... Только не он!"

languages.text: "I heard that Calligos Winterscale was a daring explorer, hunter, and trader. But all he does is blame circumstance for his failures — me, Incendia, the warp storm... Anything but himself!"
languages.original_text: "Говорят, Каллигос Винтерскейл — отважный исследователь, охотник и торговец. А у него все виноваты — я, Инцендия, варп-шторм... Только не он!"

traits.locale_text: "I heard that Calligos Winterscale is a daring explorer, hunter, and trader. But all he does is blame the circumstances — me, Incendia, the warp storm... Anything but himself!"
"I heard that Calligos Winterscale is a daring explorer, hunter, and trader. But all he does is blame the circumstances — me, Incendia, the warp storm... Anything but himself!"
"I heard that Calligos Winterscale was a daring explorer, hunter, and trader. But all he does is blame circumstance for his failures — me, Incendia, the warp storm... Anything but himself!"
"I heard that Calligos Winterscale was a daring explorer, hunter, and trader. But all he does is blame circumstance for his failures — me, Incendia, the warp storm... Anything but himself!"
"I heard that Calligos Winterscale was a daring explorer, hunter, and trader. But all he does is blame circumstance for his failures — me, Incendia, the warp storm... Anything but himself!"

languages.text: 「カリゴス・ウィンタースケールは大胆不敵な探検家であり、ハンターにして商人だと聞いた。だが、己の失敗を環境のせいにしているだけだ―{mf|俺|私}、インセンディア、歪みの嵐…だが、己に非があるとは思いもしないらしい！」
languages.original_text: "I heard that Calligos Winterscale was a daring explorer, hunter, and trader. But all he does is blame circumstance for his failures — me, Incendia, the warp storm... Anything but himself!"

traits.locale_text: 「カリゴス・ウィンタースケールは大胆不敵な探検家であり、ハンターにして商人だと聞いた。だが、己の失敗を環境のせいにしているだけだ―{mf|俺|私}、インセンディア、歪みの嵐…だが、己に非があるとは思いもしないらしい！」

languages.text: “我听说卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔是位勇敢的冒险者、猎手与商人。可现在看来，他只会把归咎于别人身上，要么是我，要么是因森蒂娅，要么是亚空间风暴……总之他自己一点错都没有！”
languages.original_text: "I heard that Calligos Winterscale was a daring explorer, hunter, and trader. But all he does is blame circumstance for his failures — me, Incendia, the warp storm... Anything but himself!"

traits.locale_text: “我听说卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔是位勇敢的冒险者、猎手与商人。可现在看来，他只会把归咎于别人身上，要么是我，要么是因森蒂娅，要么是亚空间风暴……总之他自己一点错都没有！”

languages.text: «Había oído que Calligos Winterscale era un audaz explorador, cazador y comerciante. Pero solo veo a alguien que culpa a todos los demás por sus fracasos. A Incendia, a mí, a la tormenta de disformidad... ¡lo que sea menos tener él la culpa!».
languages.original_text: "I heard that Calligos Winterscale was a daring explorer, hunter, and trader. But all he does is blame circumstance for his failures — me, Incendia, the warp storm... Anything but himself!"

traits.locale_text: «Había oído que Calligos Winterscale era un audaz explorador, cazador y comerciante. Pero solo veo a alguien que culpa a todos los demás por sus fracasos. A Incendia, a mí, a la tormenta de disformidad... ¡lo que sea menos tener él la culpa!».

languages.text: « J'avais entendu dire que Calligos Winterscale était un explorateur intrépide, un chasseur de talent et un négociant de génie. Mais il ne fait qu'attribuer la responsabilité de ses échecs à des circonstances extérieures ; moi, Incendia, la tempête Warp... Jamais à lui-même ! »
languages.original_text: "I heard that Calligos Winterscale was a daring explorer, hunter, and trader. But all he does is blame circumstance for his failures — me, Incendia, the warp storm... Anything but himself!"

traits.locale_text: « J'avais entendu dire que Calligos Winterscale était un explorateur intrépide, un chasseur de talent et un négociant de génie. Mais il ne fait qu'attribuer la responsabilité de ses échecs à des circonstances extérieures ; moi, Incendia, la tempête Warp... Jamais à lui-même ! »

languages.text: "Es heißt, Calligos Winterzunder sein ein mutiger Entdecker, Jäger und Händler. Dabei gibt er an jedem Scheitern seinerseits den Umständen die Schuld – mir, Incendia, dem Warpsturm ... Nur sich selbst nicht!"
languages.original_text: "I heard that Calligos Winterscale was a daring explorer, hunter, and trader. But all he does is blame circumstance for his failures — me, Incendia, the warp storm... Anything but himself!"

traits.locale_text: "Es heißt, Calligos Winterzunder sein ein mutiger Entdecker, Jäger und Händler. Dabei gibt er an jedem Scheitern seinerseits den Umständen die Schuld – mir, Incendia, dem Warpsturm ... Nur sich selbst nicht!"

languages.text: "Calligos Winterscale'in cesur bir kâşif, avcı ve tacir olduğunu duymuştum ama görüyorum ki başarısızlıkları için tüm şerait; ben, İncendia, öteboyut fırtınası suçlu. Bir tek kendisi değil!"
languages.original_text: "I heard that Calligos Winterscale was a daring explorer, hunter, and trader. But all he does is blame circumstance for his failures — me, Incendia, the warp storm... Anything but himself!"

traits.locale_text: "Calligos Winterscale'in cesur bir kâşif, avcı ve tacir olduğunu duymuştum ama görüyorum ki başarısızlıkları için kendi hariç tüm şeraiti suçluyor. Beni, İncendia'yı, öteboyut fırtınasını, artık eline neyi geçirirse!"
